00149 /*
00150  * Shared Memory Layout:
00151  *
00152  *    ________
00153  *   | Header |
00154  *   |--------|
00155  *   | GUARDH |
00156  *   |--------|
00157  *   | Index  |
00158  *   |        |
00159  *   |        |
00160  *   |--------|
00161  *   | GUARDI |
00162  *   |--------|
00163  *   |  Data  |
00164  *   |        |
00165  *   |        |
00166  *   |        |
00167  *   |        |
00168  *   |        |
00169  *   |        |
00170  *   |--------|
00171  *   | GUARDD |
00172  *   |________|
00173  */
00174

00180 
00181 # define ACH_RESTRICT
00182 #elif  __STDC_VERSION__ < 199901L
00183 
00184 #  define ACH_RESTRICT
00185 #else
00186 
00187 # define ACH_RESTRICT restrict
00188 #endif
00189 
00190 #if (__GNUC__ > 3 || (__GNUC__ == 3 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 1))
00191 
00192 #define ACH_DEPRECATED  __attribute__((__deprecated__))
00193 #else
00194 
00195 #define ACH_DEPRECATED
00196 #endif /* __GNUC__ */
00197 
00198 /* Determine a default clock */
00199 #ifdef CLOCK_MONOTONIC
00200 
00201 #define ACH_DEFAULT_CLOCK CLOCK_MONOTONIC
00202 #elif defined CLOCK_HIGHRES /* Old Solaris lacks CLOCK_MONOTONIC,
00203                                CLOCK_HIGHRES looks the same */
00204 
00205 #define ACH_DEFAULT_CLOCK CLOCK_HIGHRES
00206 #elif defined CLOCK_REALTIME /* Try fallback to CLOCK_REALTIME */
00207 
00208 #define ACH_DEFAULT_CLOCK CLOCK_REALTIME
00209 #else
00210 #error No valid CLOCKS defined.  Expecting CLOCK_MONOTONIC.
00211 #endif /* CLOCK_MONOTONIC */

00219 #define ACH_CHAN_NAME_MAX 64ul

00222 #define ACH_CHAN_NAME_PREFIX "/achshm-"

00225 #define ACH_INTR_RETRY 8

00231 #define ACH_SHM_MAGIC_NUM 0xb07511f3

00239 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER_NUM ((uint64_t)0x1A2A3A4A5A6A7A8ALLU)
00240 
00245 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX_NUM ((uint64_t)0x1B2B3B4B5B6B7B8BLLU)
00246 
00253 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_DATA_NUM ((uint64_t)0x1C2C3C4C5C6C7C8CLLU)

00256     typedef enum ach_status {
00257         ACH_OK = 0,             
00258         ACH_OVERFLOW = 1,       
00259         ACH_INVALID_NAME = 2,   
00260         ACH_BAD_SHM_FILE = 3,   
00261         ACH_FAILED_SYSCALL = 4, 
00262         ACH_STALE_FRAMES = 5,   
00263         ACH_MISSED_FRAME = 6,   
00264         ACH_TIMEOUT = 7,        
00265         ACH_EEXIST = 8,         
00266         ACH_ENOENT = 9,         
00267         ACH_CLOSED = 10,        
00268         ACH_BUG = 11,           
00269         ACH_EINVAL = 12,        
00270         ACH_CORRUPT = 13        
00271     } ach_status_t;

00303     typedef struct {
00304         uint32_t magic;          
00305         size_t len;              
00306         char name[1+ACH_CHAN_NAME_MAX]; 
00307         union {
00308             struct {
00309                 size_t index_cnt;        
00310                 size_t data_size;        
00311                 size_t data_head;        
00312                 size_t data_free;        
00313                 size_t index_head;       
00314                 size_t index_free;       
00315                 int anon;                
00316             };
00317             uint64_t reserved[16];  
00318         };
00319         struct /* anonymous structure */ {
00320             pthread_mutex_t mutex;         
00321             pthread_cond_t cond;           
00322             int dirty;
00323         } sync;                   
00324         /* should force our alignment to 8-bytes... */
00325         uint64_t last_seq;        
00326     } ach_header_t;
00327 
00330     typedef struct {
00331         size_t size;      
00332         size_t offset;    
00333         uint64_t seq_num; 
00334     } ach_index_t ;
00335 
00336 
00338     typedef struct {
00339         union {
00340             struct{
00341                 int map_anon;        
00342                 ach_header_t *shm;   
00343             };
00344             uint64_t reserved_size[8]; 
00345         };
00346     } ach_attr_t;
00347 
00349     typedef struct {
00350         union {
00351             struct{
00352                 int map_anon;      
00353                 ach_header_t *shm; 
00354                 int truncate;      
00355                 int set_clock;     
00356                 clockid_t clock;   
00358             };
00359             uint64_t reserved[16]; 
00360         };
00361     } ach_create_attr_t;
00362 
00365     typedef struct {
00366         union {
00367             struct {
00368                 ach_header_t *shm;   
00369                 size_t len;          
00370                 int fd;              
00371                 uint64_t seq_num;    
00372                 size_t next_index;   
00373                 ach_attr_t attr;     
00374             };
00375             uint64_t reserved[16]; 
00376         };
00377     } ach_channel_t;
00378 
00380     extern size_t ach_channel_size;
00382     extern size_t ach_attr_size;
00383 
00385 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER( shm ) ((uint64_t*)((ach_header_t*)(shm) + 1))
00386 
00388 #define ACH_SHM_INDEX( shm ) ((ach_index_t*)(ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER(shm) + 1))
00389 
00391 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX( shm )                                      \
00392     ((uint64_t*)(ACH_SHM_INDEX(shm) + ((ach_header_t*)(shm))->index_cnt))
00393 
00395 #define ACH_SHM_DATA( shm ) ( (uint8_t*)(ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX(shm) + 1) )
00396 
00398 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_DATA( shm )                                       \
00399     ((uint64_t*)(ACH_SHM_DATA(shm) + ((ach_header_t*)(shm))->data_size))
